Description_lang: When a Festering Wound bursts the cooldown of Apocalypse is reduced by ${$s2/10}.1 sec. Festering Wound damage is increased by |cFFFFFFFF${$s1}.1%|r.

description_blz.en_US: When a Festering Wound bursts the cooldown of Apocalypse is reduced by 1.0 sec. Festering Wound damage is increased by 15.0%.
description_blz.es_MX: Cuando una Herida degenerativa explota, el tiempo de reutilización de Apocalipsis se reduce 1.0 s. El daño de Herida degenerativa aumenta un 15.0%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Quando uma Ferida Purulenta irrompe, a recarga do Apocalipse é reduzida em 1,0 s. Aumenta em 15,0% o dano de Ferida Purulenta.
description_blz.de_DE: Wenn eine schwärende Wunde platzt, wird die Abklingzeit von 'Apokalypse' um 1,0 Sek. verringert. Der Schaden von schwärenden Wunden ist um 15,0% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: When a Festering Wound bursts the cooldown of Apocalypse is reduced by 1.0 sec. Festering Wound damage is increased by 15.0%.
description_blz.es_ES: Cuando estalla una herida degenerativa, el tiempo de reutilización de Apocalipsis se reduce un 1,0 sec. Festering Wound damage is increased by 15,0%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Lorsqu’une Blessure purulente éclate, le temps de recharge d’Apocalypse est réduit de 1,0 s. Les dégâts de Blessure purulente sont augmentés de 15,0%.
description_blz.it_IT: Quando una Ferita Putrescente si manifesta, riduce il tempo di recupero di Apocalisse del 1,0 sec. Festering Wound damage is increased by 15,0%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Когда "Гнойная язва" прорывается, время восстановления "Апокалипсиса" сокращается на 1,0 сек. "Гнойная язва" наносит на 15,0% больше урона.
description_blz.ko_KR: 고름 상처 파열 시 대재앙의 재사용 대기시간이 1.0초만큼 감소합니다. 고름 상처의 공격력이 15.0%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 膿瘡傷口爆裂時，天啟的冷卻時間縮短1.01秒。膿瘡傷口的傷害提高15.0%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 溃烂之伤爆炸时，天启的冷却时间缩短1.0秒。溃烂之伤的伤害增加15.0%。
